com.binghamton.jhelp.util

Class StringMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.binghamton.jhelp.util.StringMatcher
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DamerauLevenshteinStringMatcher, LevenshteinStringMatcher

    public abstract class StringMatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract base class for fuzzy string matchers to extend with their own algorithm for computing edit distance.
